title: Net Safety Tips On The Go
creator: Internet Education Foundation

extendedInfo.description: Net Safety Tips On The Go makes it easy to keep up with online privacy, safety, and security issues on your Android phone. This app provides quick, practical, friendly advice for you and your family. Itâs delivered in easy-to-digest portions â one tip at a time â to help you use the Internet and your phone safely.You set the frequency for receiving new tips. One a day? One a week? Whenever you choose. Your status bar will notify you when they've arrived.FeaturesFor sharing and saving: Ping tips to your kids and friends via email or save to your phone for later viewing.Current and relevant: New tips on the latest issues sent automatically to your phone.Timely and convenient: Brief, easy-to-read tips delivered at intervals you choose.Packed with expert advice: Tips developed by leading online safety organizations on important issues like:o Kids and Inappropriate Materialo Mobile Privacy and Safetyo Searching and Surfing in Privacyo Teen Concerns â Texting, Sexting, and Cyberbullying o Computer and Data Securityo Hackers and Your Financial Infoo Social Networking and Facebook Safetyo Avoiding Identity Theft

reviews.comment: It\'s a nice idea but a surprising number of the tips are essentially \"read these tips\" with no actual tip included.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love the daily tips. Thanks, I\'ll pass it along.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: good tips for 1st time internet users.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Doesn\'t do what it says it does with notifications. Messages are redundant and trivial.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Just installed, for 27 hours no tip at all!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Thanks, glad someone cares enough about safety to give me daily advice!
reviews.author: A Google User
